name: Mardel Fight
description:
Mardel Fight: 2D Combat Game

This videogame is center in fighting 2D based on meaninful characters and places from Mar del Plata, Argentina city.

Pick a fight and defeat your opponent! 

(More characters will be added)

Controls
  • Move left and right with arrows and A -D keys.
  • Jump with Space.
  • Short attack with M key and range attack with N.
Credits
  • Gonzalo Lascar | Programming
  • Maximiliano Uberman | Game Design
  • Tomás Molina | @luxboy27 | Art 2D and Animation 2D
  • Misael Centeno | Music and SFX
  • Nicolás Suarez | Support
